name: Traditional Bonein Wings Near Me
description: A mobile app that will send you notifications whenever restaurants near by has them on the menu.

name: The Ultimate Animal Quiz
description: A web app that will give users 10 new unique questions each day and track their progress of their knowledge in various categories of animals in different climates, countries and species!

name: Power Washing
description: A game for Windows and macOS where players power-wash graffiti, hog trailers/barns, decks, homes and so on.
